briefdescription.para: Search DMA channel context for specified DMA channel resource.

simplesect.para: The request DMA channel context if resource is valid or NULL if resource in invalid

briefdescription.para: Request DMA resource from DMA Manager.

parameterdescription.para: if all DMA channels are occupied;

briefdescription.para: Disable DMA interrupt NOTE: Each DMA instance consists of several DMA channels, disabling the DMA interrupt will disable the global DMA interrupt for all DMA channels. Please be aware of the impact.
Install Interrupt Callback for DMA channel transfer complete.

parameterdescription.para: User data used in the callback

briefdescription.para: Install Interrupt Callback for DMA channel half transfer complete.

parameterdescription.para: User data used in the callback

briefdescription.para: Install Interrupt Callback for DMA channel transfer error.

parameterdescription.para: User data used in the callback

briefdescription.para: Install Interrupt Callback for DMA channel transfer abort.

parameterdescription.para: User data used in the callback

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel source work mode.

parameterdescription.para:
DMA source work mode
DMA_MGR_HANDSHAKE_MODE_NORMAL
DMA_MGR_HANDSHAKE_MODE_HANDSHAKE

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel destination work mode.

parameterdescription.para:
DMA destination work mode
DMA_MGR_HANDSHAKE_MODE_NORMAL
DMA_MGR_HANDSHAKE_MODE_HANDSHAKE

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel source burst size.

parameterdescription.para:
DMA source burst size when BURSTOPT is 0, please reference follows:
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_1T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_2T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_4T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_8T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_16T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_32T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_64T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_128T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_256T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_512T
DMA_MGR_NUM_TRANSFER_PER_BURST_1024T when BURSTOPT is 1, burst size is (burstsize + 1). Attention: only DMAV2 support

briefdescription.para: Get DMA channel remaining transfer size.

parameterdescription.para: remaining transfer size of the channel.

transfer source width of the channel
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_BYTE
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_HALF_WORD
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_WORD
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_DOUBLE_WORD

transfer destination width of the channel
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_BYTE
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_HALF_WORD
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_WORD
DMA_MGR_TRANSFER_WIDTH_DOUBLE_WORD

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel source address control mode.

parameterdescription.para:
source address control mode
DMA_MGR_ADDRESS_CONTROL_INCREMENT
DMA_MGR_ADDRESS_CONTROL_DECREMENT
DMA_MGR_ADDRESS_CONTROL_FIXED

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel destination address control mode.

parameterdescription.para:
destination address control mode
DMA_MGR_ADDRESS_CONTROL_INCREMENT
DMA_MGR_ADDRESS_CONTROL_DECREMENT
DMA_MGR_ADDRESS_CONTROL_FIXED

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel infinite loop mode. Attention: only DMAV2 support.

parameterdescription.para: false - normal mode(single times mode); true - infinite loop mode(cycle mode)

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel source burst option. Attention: only DMAV2 support.
Set DMA channel handshake option. Attention: only DMAV2 support.

parameterdescription.para: transfer status DMA_MGR_CHANNEL_STATUS_ONGOING if transfer is still ongoing DMA_MGR_CHANNEL_STATUS_ERROR if any error occurred during transferring DMA_MGR_CHANNEL_STATUS_ABORT if transfer is aborted DMA_MGR_CHANNEL_STATUS_TC if transfer is finished without error DMA_MGR_CHANNEL_STATUS_HALF_TC if half transfer complete without error. Attention: only DMAV2 support

briefdescription.para: Set DMA channel source burst in fixed transfer size enable or disable.
Set DMA channel destination burst in fixed transfer size enable or disable.

parameterdescription.para:
swap mode
DMA_MGR_SWAP_MODE_TABLE
DMA_MGR_SWAP_MODE_BYTE
DMA_MGR_SWAP_MODE_HALF_WORD
DMA_MGR_SWAP_MODE_WORD
